li.text:
- Chthonic Tiefling - Abyssal Tiefling - Air Genasi - Earth Genasi - Fire Genasi - Water Genasi - Thri-kreen - Minotaur
Unlike the ones above, these ones won't spawn naturally. Events will be added in future updates for them to spawn through. - Deva - Planetar - Cambion
All of the icons used for the xenotypes in this are now available to use on custom xenotypes too.
